DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect commercially available ferment dairy product contain probiotic ( 4 week , twice day ) abdominal distension IBS patient constipation ( IBS-C ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Single-centre , Randomised , Double-blind , Controlled , Parallel-group Study Evaluate Effect Fermented Dairy Product Abdominal Distension , Digestive Symptoms Rectal Sensitivity Patients With Irritable Bowel Syndrome With Constipation ( IBS-C )
